nodes.body: {ğŸ® releases} [Singe 2.10](https://SingeEngine.com), the Somewhat Interactive Nostalgic Game Engine, has been released by [Kangaroo Punch Studios](https://kangaroopunch.com/)!

{ğŸ“¼ video} Check out [this cool video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MQzpLLhN0fY) about the precursors to computers! Thanks to [Nosteru](https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198169376761) from the Bring It On! Community for the link!

{ğŸ“† events} [STL TechWeek](https://techstl.com/techweek/) is coming up from April 8-12! Good opportunity to network with people in the local tech scene, especially the Gaming 101 event on the 11th!

{ğŸ›  projects} [DrewUniverse](https://github.com/DrewUniverse) contributed art to a new [rhythm minigame](https://legendofdragoon.org/guides/how-to-play-rhythm-minigame/) for use with Legend of Dragoon's fan-made [PC port](https://legendofdragoon.org/projects/severed-chains/).
